Downloading the Cyc Java API

The source code for the Cyc APIs is now available on the Cycorp GitHub page!

Requirements

  • JDK 1.7 or greater to build; code can be run on Java 6.
  • An EnterpriseCyc or ResearchCyc server running at least system 10.152303. The current version of the Cyc API suite is not compatible with the latest 4.0 OpenCyc release. For inquiries about obtaining a suitable version of EnterpriseCyc or ResearchCyc, see below.
  • Apache Maven, version 3.2 or higher. If you are new to Maven, you may wish to view the quick start.

Getting Started

To get started, download and install the CycCoreAPI project.

You may then wish to download the CoreAPIUseCases project and explore the sample code.

Dependency Information

Apache Maven

The Cyc Core API Suite consists of the following three dependencies:

<dependency>
  <groupId>com.cyc</groupId>
  <artifactId>cyc-session</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0-rc1</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.cyc</groupId>
  <artifactId>cyc-kb</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0-rc1</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
  <groupId>com.cyc</groupId>
  <artifactId>cyc-query</artifactId>
  <version>1.0.0-rc1</version>
</dependency>

Acquiring Cyc

To inquire about a getting a license for a supported Cyc server, please fill out the following form. For information on the different Cyc platforms, visit here.
